title: Software Developer
description:
BrainBox AI utilizes self-adapted artificial intelligence technology to proactively optimize the energy consumption of one of the largest climate change contributors: Buildings 
 
Our AI engine supports a self-operating building that requires no human intervention. Using deep learning, cloud-based computing, and our proprietary process, our solution autonomously optimizes existing Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) control systems for maximum impact on energy consumption. 
 
An exciting opportunity awaits the right candidate to be part of a fast-growing company. We are seeking an software developer
 
What you will do:

Coordinate within development teams to automate and develop tools and technology to streamline the deployment and contribute to product roadmap
Improve smart building global deployment tools, templates, and processes automation related to project scalability deployment
Write efficient, scalable, and maintainable code to ensure high-performance and reliable backend functionality and API
Work as part of a team to develop custom web-based monitoring, data-driven analysis and control systems, meeting both internal and client requirements
Create sustainable systems and services through automation and uplifts
Participate cross-functionally with teams for testing and implementation 
Document work processes and procedures
Manages weekly time allocations to multiple assigned projects for on-time weekly submission of the individual’s timesheet
Other tasks as assigned

 
What you will need to be successful

Bachelor’s degree in software engineering, computer science, or any other related field
2-3 years of work experience as software development and software automation process skill
Strong understanding of software engineering principles, including writing reusable, testable, and efficient Python applications, with a solid grasp of Object-Oriented Programming concepts
Proficiency in backend development, including designing, developing, and deploying microservices and RESTful APIs using Python FastAPI framework
Experience in working with both relational databases (e.g., MySQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB).
Hands-on experience with containerization tools (Docker) and CI/CD tooling such as Terraform and GitLab
Proven experience in deployment in AWS environments
Strong organizational and communication skills, able to work in Agile framework

 
Nice to have

Experience with frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript, and one web application development framework (React, Vue.js)
Knowledge of Smart Building, Building Automation Systems (BAS), and HVAC operation
Good understanding of data driven systems/solutions and IT network

 
Why work at BrainBox AI 

Cool Environment | Collaborative Culture | Growth Opportunities 
Make a significant impact on the world - join the fight against climate change 
Be a part of a revolutionary technology movement 
Collaborate with innovative, out-of-the-(Brain) box thinkers in a fast-paced environment 
Work with amazing people who truly have a passion in the work they do 

 
At BrainBox AI, we are committed to providing an inclusive work environment. We value the diversity of our team, and we strongly believe in the power of people. We foster a safe space for our employees to thrive regardless of race, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, and religion.

Posted 9 hours ago

BrainBox AI utilizes self-adapted artificial intelligence technology to proactively optimize the energy consumption of one of the largest climate change contributors: Buildings 

 

Our AI engine supports a self-operating building that requires no human intervention. Using deep learning, cloud-based computing, and our proprietary process, our solution autonomously optimizes existing Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) control systems for maximum impact on energy consumption. 

 

An exciting opportunity awaits the right candidate to be part of a fast-growing company. We are seeking an software developer

 

What you will do:

  • Coordinate within development teams to automate and develop tools and technology to streamline the deployment and contribute to product roadmap
  • Improve smart building global deployment tools, templates, and processes automation related to project scalability deployment
  • Write efficient, scalable, and maintainable code to ensure high-performance and reliable backend functionality and API
  • Work as part of a team to develop custom web-based monitoring, data-driven analysis and control systems, meeting both internal and client requirements
  • Create sustainable systems and services through automation and uplifts
  • Participate cross-functionally with teams for testing and implementation 
  • Document work processes and procedures
  • Manages weekly time allocations to multiple assigned projects for on-time weekly submission of the individual’s timesheet
  • Other tasks as assigned

 

What you will need to be successful

  • Bachelor’s degree in software engineering, computer science, or any other related field
  • 2-3 years of work experience as software development and software automation process skill
  • Strong understanding of software engineering principles, including writing reusable, testable, and efficient Python applications, with a solid grasp of Object-Oriented Programming concepts
  • Proficiency in backend development, including designing, developing, and deploying microservices and RESTful APIs using Python FastAPI framework
  • Experience in working with both relational databases (e.g., MySQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB).
  • Hands-on experience with containerization tools (Docker) and CI/CD tooling such as Terraform and GitLab
  • Proven experience in deployment in AWS environments
  • Strong organizational and communication skills, able to work in Agile framework

 

Nice to have

  • Experience with frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript, and one web application development framework (React, Vue.js)
  • Knowledge of Smart Building, Building Automation Systems (BAS), and HVAC operation
  • Good understanding of data driven systems/solutions and IT network

 

Why work at BrainBox AI 

  • Cool Environment | Collaborative Culture | Growth Opportunities 
  • Make a significant impact on the world - join the fight against climate change 
  • Be a part of a revolutionary technology movement 
  • Collaborate with innovative, out-of-the-(Brain) box thinkers in a fast-paced environment 
  • Work with amazing people who truly have a passion in the work they do 

 

At BrainBox AI, we are committed to providing an inclusive work environment. We value the diversity of our team, and we strongly believe in the power of people. We foster a safe space for our employees to thrive regardless of race, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, and religion. 

Apply now Apply later
